00028 #ifndef __MovablePlane_H__
00029 #define __MovablePlane_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 
00033 #include "OgrePlane.h"
00034 #include "OgreMovableObject.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre {
00037 
00038 
00053     class _OgreExport MovablePlane : public Plane, public MovableObject
00054     {
00055     protected:
00056         mutable Plane mDerivedPlane;
00057         mutable Vector3 mLastTranslate;
00058         mutable Quaternion mLastRotate;
00059         AxisAlignedBox mNullBB;
00060         mutable bool mDirty;
00061         static String msMovableType;
00062     public:
00063 
00064         MovablePlane(const String& name);
00065         MovablePlane (const Plane& rhs);
00067         MovablePlane (const Vector3& rkNormal, Real fConstant);
00068         MovablePlane (const Vector3& rkNormal, const Vector3& rkPoint);
00069         MovablePlane (const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1,
00070             const Vector3& rkPoint2);
00071         ~MovablePlane() {}
00073         void _notifyCurrentCamera(Camera*) { /* don't care */ }
00075         const AxisAlignedBox& getBoundingBox(void) const { return mNullBB; }
00077         Real getBoundingRadius(void) const { return 0.0f; }
00079         void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue*) { /* do nothing */}
00081         const String& getMovableType(void) const;
00083         const Plane& _getDerivedPlane(void) const;
00085         void visitRenderables(Renderable::Visitor* visitor, 
00086             bool debugRenderables = false)
00087                 {
00088                     /* do nothing */
00089                     (void)visitor;
00090                     (void)debugRenderables;
00091                 }
00092 
00093     };
00096 }
00097 #endif
